price: Ababangikanyamana, ntibigera bashikirwa n’inkebuzo nshasha ivuye kwa Nyenimpuhwe Allah, ibabwiriza ivyo bakora n’ivyo bareka mu kwubahiriza idini ry’ukuri, kiretse ko birengagiza nya nkebuzo, bakayihakana bivuye inyuma, bakanayamirira kure.
arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن ذِكۡرٖ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مُحۡدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ عَنۡهُ مُعۡرِضِينَ

meta.transliteration: wamā yatīhim min dhik'rin mina al-raḥmāni muḥ'dathin illā kānū ʿanhu muʿ'riḍīna
